## Exercise 1


```{r}

library(tidyverse)

spanish_flu <- read.csv(
  "D:/R_scripts/my_book/book_ggplot2/data/Chapter04/spanishflu.csv", 
  header = TRUE,  sep=",")

ggplot(spanish_flu,aes(x=age)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 2, boundary = 0, 
      closed = "left",fill = "#0072B290",
    color = "#0072B2") + 
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0), 
       limits = c(0,8000)) +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0,0), 
      breaks = seq(0,100,20)) +
  labs(x = "Age at death (yrs)", y = "Frequency") +
  theme_us_classic() +
  theme(plot.margin = margin(t = 5, r = 15,
            b = 2, l = 5))

```
